title: Social Media - SMAnalysis
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a generic SMAnalysis made for the Social Media domain. This entity is primarily associated with the process of analysis of Social Media applications' posts.

type.description: Property. NGSI-LD Entity Type. It must be equal to SMAnalysis.

hasConfidence.description: Property.  Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. It represents the confidence of the analysis.

hasAnalysisValue.description: Property.  Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The type of the analysis.

hasAnalysisType.description: Property.  Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The value of the analysis.

isAnalysisOf.description: Relationship. The ID of the post or the collection that was used in the analysis.
